ticket.title: request.remote_ip return same ip for all clients
ticket.original-body:
I have a ip-protected area in my application. I test if the request.remote_ip is equivalent to my fix ip.
But since the new rails update I receive for all clients the same ip. It worked well before I made the rails update to 2.3.2 .
previous rails = 2.0.2 rails = 2.3.2 mongrel = 1.1.5 Apache = 2.2.3
